title: The Sin Eaterâ€™s Daughter
description: Librarian's Note: Alternate-cover edition for ISBN10: 0545810620 / ISBN13: 9780545810623I am the perfect weapon.I kill with a single touch.Twylla is blessed. The Gods have chosen her to marry a prince and rule the kingdom. But the favour of the Gods has its price. A deadly poison infuses her skin. Those who anger the queen must die under Twylla's fatal touch.Only Lief, an outspoken new guard, can see past Twylla's chilling role to the girl she truly is.Yet in a court as dangerous as the queen's, some truths should not be told...
author: Melinda Salisbury
